profile:
Three Little Pigs Masonry provides expert masonry and concrete repairs, restoration and installation for the home and business owner.  
Our estimating department works as a team to find long term solutions and  help homeowners with many permanent solutions to their problems where other competitors have failed to succeed. Having over 45 years experience doesn't hurt either. 
The team at Three Little Pigs Masonry works together to provide the customer with a positive contractor experience from the first call to the last team member to leave your completed project. Most importantly,  you are dealing with actual MASONS from the management, the estimators and the crews on your property. 
No sales person will call and no high pressure sales pitch. Our warranties reflect the confidence Three Little Pigs Masonry provides.
Compare our warranties to those of our competitors. 
We are a family owned and operated business that prides itself  on the highest quality work and  providing exceptional customer service.

We specialize in STONE REFACING , structural masonry and concrete including underpinning and walk outs!
 
Here is a small list of our services: foundations, footings, pilings, parging, tuck pointing, concrete repair and restoration, concrete step repair, window sills, chimney repair and restoration, basement walkouts, flagstone, columns, pillars, patios, privacy walls, flagstone walkways, retaining walls, stone refacing, stone options to cover wood, stucco etc., waterproofing, underpinning, foundation repair, restoration- repair to stone, brick or block.
 
Please call us today!        

We're social here:
https://www.facebook.com/thirdlittlepig/
https://twitter.com/3PigsMasonry
https://www.instagram.com/threelittlepigsmasonry/

profile:
At City Concrete Construction Inc. we are construction contractors for large industrial and residential projects.  

Our in-house construction division is able to service all your professional concrete finishing, foundation walls, basement underpinning, countertops, outside kitchens, hard landscaping, interlocking stonework, residential waterproofing, masonry tuck-pointing and restoration and disposal bins. City Concrete’s finishing employees have had a combined total of over 75 years of experience, within the concrete and construction industry.  

We are proud members of the Toronto and Mississauga Construction Association. 

We are also Licensed contractors by the City of Toronto

profile: Royal Stone is a recognized installer of premier interlocking paving stones, retaining walls, steps, curbs, and natural stone products. Whether you're designing a complete streetscape or a residential walkway, patio and driveway, Royal Stone can provide you with a range of applications. Our qualified staff will take your project from the design stage to completion in an organized and professional manner. Let your surroundings express who you are. Royal Stone's experienced landscape designers will guide you in selecting features that come together to create balance and harmony. Our use of hand drawn and computer-generated renderings effectively bridge the gap between concept and reality, assuring our clients that their new surroundsing will be all that they envisioned - and more. DRIVEWAYS / WALKWAYS Driveways and walkways provide curb appearl to homes. They are a point of artistic expression allowing customers to express their personal style. OUTDOOR LIVING Outdoor living spaces provide an impressive focal point where you can relax, dine and entertain with familiy and friends. Outdoor kitchens, fireplaces and firepits are just some of the possibilities. POOLS Pools provide an impressive focal point where you can relax and entertain with family and friends. Spas are great alternative for spaces wehre a pool is not feasible. WE SPECIALIZE IN Driveways, Walkways, Interlocking Stone, Flagstone, Pools, Spas, Hot Tubs, Water Features, Inifinity Edge, Landscaping, Patios, Cabanas, Gazebos, Outdoor Kitchens & Fireplaces

profile:
Concrete One Ltd. is an industry-leading, family-owned and operated company that has been in service for more than 30 years and three generations. In this time, we have provided customers with quality workmanship at an affordable price. We have developed and proven expertise and skill in concrete, paving, finishing, and landscaping.

***

Our greatest pride is our extreme attention to detail and determination for customers to be happy with the final result. This combination of hard work and providing the best service has been the key to keeping us at the top of our industry for more than three decades.

***

We prize the long-lasting relationships we have formed with our clients. Among them are the people at Eagle Steel Inc., Downsview Long-Term Care Centre, Perfect Poultry Inc., Red Horse Construction Corp., and the countless homeowners who have let us help them beautify their property. The trust and confidence they give us is more than enough to keep us going. At Concrete One Ltd., we kindly thank our clients, both past and present, along with anyone considering our services for their next project.

We look forward to working with you.
name: Concrete One Ltd.

profile:
Welcome to AMPAC PavingVersatile experience in residential landscaping services and commercial paving. AMPAC Paving and Concrete is a quality driven, consumer oriented business with a reputation for excellence. We have been delivering superior service in the GTA for over a quarter-century. 

***

Residential Landscaping Service — Curb Appeal Specialists
Curb-Appeal is a real estate term that rates your home exterior appearance. Let AMPAC help you maximize your Curb Appeal with:
Classic Asphalt Paving
Decorative Interlocking Brick
Custom Concrete Curbs, Walk-paths, Garage Flooring
Durable and Pleasing Retainer Walls
Commercial Paving — Professional Contractors
Whether you're renovating existing or building new, AMPAC has the people the experience and the equipment to get the job done on time and on budget:
Roadway and Parking Lot Paving
Concrete curbs and Walkways
Asphalt and Paving Repairs and Resurfacing
Interlock Sidewalks

***

Contact us today to schedule your appointment.

profile: Misississauga Concrete Contractors & Epoxy Specialists since 1986! Looking for Epoxy Flooring or Concrete Repairs? We have the highest quality products and expertise when it comes to concrete repairs, decoration, waterproofing, epoxy coatings and more. Visit our showroom, Goldwell Restoration of Mississauga, On - Interior and exterior walls,ceiling, floors - Repair -Protect-Renew -Decorate - Concrete-Stucco-Wood-Bricks - Waterproof -Coatings- Overlays- Staining Garage repairs, Concrete repairs, epoxy, restoration Call Us For Free Advice and Estimate We offer: * contact 24/7 * free consultation and design for our customers * detailed estimates and professional advice * 100% satisfaction guarantee * years of experience Safety and ecological issues are our top priorities. That is why we are environmentally friendly by using most VOC-free, eco-friendly materials to meet LEED requirements. Goldwell Restoration, Ltd. is a well established company since 1986, specializing in interior and exterior restoration, renovation and decoration of floors, walls and ceilings. Restoring and decorating concrete, stucco, wood. Polymer floors and overlays. Re staining and general painting. We also offer: Stucco Systems (EIFS) and Repairs, Concrete Repair and Refinishing, Waterproofing, Interior and Exterior Painting, Drywall Repair, Staining and Refinishing of cabinets, stairs and railings, front doors, decks, etc... GARAGE FLOOR 10 reason to finish floor with epoxy 1. Beautification-the most obvious reason,but not to be overlooked. The difference is like night and day. With thousands of possible garage flooring epoxy,flake,stained and top coat combination you can find the right look that fits your home and style. 2. PROPERTY VALUE-Another not so obvious one would be that a finished garage floor actually increases the value of your home. In fact a lot of builders these days installing garage flooring prior to placing the home on the market to fetch a prettier penny! The Garage is the new front door! 3. CLEAN--A garage floor coated with epoxy is EXTREMELY easy to clean. Concrete is naturally porous,so dirt,oil and other chemicals enter into the tiny pores of the concrete and are impossible to get out,therefore causing it to dull and stain.Garage floor coatings act as a sealant,allowing you to simply rinse or brush away dirt,grime,and oil 4. MORE LIGHT-Garage flooring systems generally include a glossy topcoat that is impressively reflective. This can help with lightning issues even in the most dingy of garages! Many people find it's even plausible to take out some of the existing lightning to save money on electricity while still maintaining great visibility. 5. GO GREEN-Sealing your garage floor concrete is one way to do your part in saving our environment ! This eliminates oil,brake fluid ,and other nasty chemicals from leaking into the ground from your garage floor. This coupled with the fact that you could reduce lightning due to your new garage floor's reflective properties gets you 2green thumbs up ! 6. KEEPS YOU ON YOUR FEET-A wet or oily concrete floor can be hazardous and quite in these litigious times,a liability !The finish of your garage flooring system performs more just the obvious function of looking cool; it's non slip, environmentally friendly non toxic floor 7. REDUCE MVE-Moisture Vapor Emission is a common problem in coastal areas and occurs when moisture vapor rises up trough the concrete. Not only will this wreck your concrete but it can also cause your vehicles to rust. When selecting your epoxy garage flooring system this is something especially important to consider . 8. STOP CONCRETE EROSION-Alkali when coupled with moisture can cause serious problems for your garage floor concrete .If there are existing alkaline and moisture issues ,the concrete must be properly prepped to prevent adhesion. Failures but once your garage flooring has been properly installed ,it will help combat concrete erosion inherently caused by these phenomenon. 9. EXPRESS YOURSELF -Not only do you have your choice of base coat epoxy,flake color and level of gloss but you have a choice of concrete stain,personal design or any image or logo.Make your garage floor your own! 10. STAY ORGANIZED-Naturally a clean ,attractive garage floor is going to motivate you to keep your new extension of your living space looking good and highly functional. WELL THERE YOU GO-10 reasons to get your garage flooring system installed.This isn't something you want to cut cost on,your garage flooring system if applied properly and good products are used can last you a lifetime.

profile:
Since the company launch, it has been our mission to provide superior quality and durable stamped concrete, and Traditional concrete in order to add value to your home. Durus concrete Mississauga is managed and employs concrete contractors in Mississauga who have years of experience in the industry. Every contractor has polished their skills and understanding of every concrete process in order to be able to deliver quality work that will exceed customers' expectations. We value every project and every customer.

Durus Concrete is a Mississauga and Oakville based Stamped Concrete and decorative concrete company specializing in concrete related products and services. Our products and services include any type of formed Concrete such as exposed aggregate concrete sealant, and engraved concrete.

Our technique is cost effective, providing our customers a luxury look without the expensive price. Whether you’re interested in improving your homes curb appeal with our decorative concrete products or replacing that tired driveway, walkway or patio, with the sophisticated look of decorative concrete, Durus concrete can help. We strive to help our customers to understand the benefits of stamped, decorative and traditional concrete

Durus Concrete is a Mississauga and Oakville based Stamped Concrete and exposed concrete company specializing in concrete related products and services

profile:
We do Concrete work and Jewel Stone..
Jewel stone might be your best upgrade option...
WHAT IS JEWEL STONE?
If you are looking for a way to transform everyday concrete into beautiful,decorative stone finishing,there is no better answer that Jewel Stone.
This new acrylic modified cement based floor coating, can be applied to simple concrete and masonry, and you will and up having a decorative and attractive stone finish.
It is ideal for walkways, terraces,patios,pool areas, or recreational flooring that requires the look and performance of stone.
The luxuries and classic beauty of hand laid stone
Slate,flagstone,Mexican tile, or wood plank can be achieved in any color combination, adding Valued to you home at a very affordable price.
Jewel Stone can be applied in walls and floors interior and exterior
Jewel Stone is a blend of select silica aggregates and mineral additives that produces A stone hard consistency in the concrete .
Jewel Stone is also available as s Plus Line which is ideal for questionable substrates what require high impact resistance and durability.

profile:
Royal Rock is a construction company that has been present since the year 2014. With a clientele ranging throughout the GTA, the business is renowned for its outstanding customer service and exquisite attention to detail. Royal Rock has successfully managed both small and large-scale jobs and continues to improve its professionalism through dedication and honesty. 

Royal Rock focuses on interlocking, jewelstone, flagstone, and retaining wall systems. We specialize in converting your plain or old concrete surfaces including fire places, basement floors, garage floors, and verandas using Jewelstone into beautiful faux-stone finishes that will add both beauty and value to your property.

With endless possibilities in colour and design, Jewelstone will give the appearance and performance of real stone and only for a fraction of the cost!!

The benefits of Durock's Jewelstone products include: · 100s of colour combinations and designs · Economical, easy to install & maintain · Can be applied to most surfaces · Can withstand heavy traffic · Endures harsh freeze thaw cycles · Resists UV exposure · Excellent abrasion resistance
Our goal was to bring on board something new and more affordable and a great alternative to flagstone.
